title: Throttle Body Plate (butterfly) - check/clean

body.body: Before starting work, ensure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported. This will help prevent it from falling and causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Throttle Body Removal - DD2; DD4; DE; DE2; DEX; DF; DF2; DF4; DG4

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DD4; DG4; DF4; DEX; DD2; DF2; DF; DE2; DE

body.body: Using a lint free cloth and a suitable degreaser such as Castrol Motorcycle Parts Cleaner, remove any residue from the internal surfaces and throttle plate (butterfly).
Check for any signs of damage and ensure the butterfly moves correctly.
Throttle Body Install - DD2; DD4; DE; DE2; DEX; DF; DF2; DF4; DG4

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DD4; DG4; DF4; DEX; DD2; DF2; DF; DE2; DE

search: Before starting work, ensure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported. This will help prevent it from falling and causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Using a lint free cloth and a suitable degreaser such as Castrol Motorcycle Parts Cleaner, remove any residue from the internal surfaces and throttle plate (butterfly).
Check for any signs of damage and ensure the butterfly moves correctly.
